# Abbreviations and Acronyms {-}

```{r acronyms, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, comment = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
library(readxl)

acronyms <- read_xlsx("resources/acronyms.xlsx")
acronyms <- acronyms[order(acronyms$acronym),]

acronyms %>%
  kbl(col.names = NULL) %>%
  kable_styling() %>%
  column_spec(1, bold = T)
```
